message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. It's worth $8,000 to you, just like it is to me. Considering its unique value and quality, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7,200. Don't miss this opportunity to own something truly remarkable at an exclusive discount. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this purchase.
